summary: Adds a shout which teleports the player to different towns and other places.
descriptionHtml:
~ ~ ~ Himdah Wundun Nu ~ ~ ~

Created by DraconBlade (Steam)/BlackLink16 (Skyrim Nexus)

===========
Description
===========

Places a shrine near Loreius's Farm which teaches the Travel Home shout.
Using the full three word shout allows the player to transport themselves
to a number of different places. Using the one word shout will transport
the player back to the last place the shout was used to traveled to.

=========
ChangeLog
=========

v1.0 (2013/18/05)
- Initial version.

============
Requirements
============

No requirements other than Skyrim.

============
Installation
============

1. Extract the files to SkyrimData
2. Activate Himdah Wundun Nu.esp

==================
In-Game Activation
==================

Find and activate the shrine. The images should give some idea of where it
is. Search a little distance from Loreius's Farm.

=======
Credits
=======

Creation Kit Wiki:
http://www.creationkit.com/

===============
Licensing/Legal
===============

Please contact me before redistributing.
author: BlackLink16
